issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Adding mask function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17121](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17121). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add mask(str inp[, str uc-mask[, str lc-mask[, str num-mask]]]) function to Gandiva.

With default masking upper case letters as 'X', lower case letters as 'x' and numbers as 'n'.
Custom masking as optionally specified in parameters.
